Hero.description: Analyze your lease. Chat with AI about what it means. Know the law in your city and state. And write letters to your landlord to protect yourself. For free.

Creator.institution: University of Chicago Law School â€¢ AI Lab

aiAnalysis.title: Get instant AI analysis of your lease
aiAnalysis.description: Upload your PDF and get a full report in under 2 minutes. Our AI scans every clause, spots potential issues, and delivers a clear summary you can actually use.
aiAnalysis.stat1Description: Fast analysis that explains what matters most in plain English.
aiAnalysis.stat2Description: Up-to-date data helps you make informed decisions.

aiChat.title: Chat with AI about your lease
aiChat.description: Understand any clause by chatting with AI trained to read your lease. Ask anything, from pet policies to lease breaks, and get clear answers fast.
aiChat.stat1Description: Get answers to specific questions in seconds with cited sources.
aiChat.stat2Description: AI remembers your conversation and understands your lease details.

stateLaws.title: Understand your stateâ€™s renter laws
stateLaws.description: See exactly which state and city laws apply to you. Learn about the rules around security-deposits, lease terminations, maintenance obligations, and legal protections in your state and city.
stateLaws.stat1Description: Complete coverage of renter laws across all US states with city-specific regulations.
stateLaws.stat2Description: Current legal information with sources cited, so you always have reliable renter law guidance.

marketData.title: Generate letters to help with your rental issues
marketData.description: Need repairs to your apartment? Want to get your deposit back? Get tailored, professional-quality letters to address issues with your landlord, lease, or repairs.
marketData.stat1Description: Comprehensive topics for letter-generation, from repair requests to deposit disputes.
marketData.stat2Description: Developed by the University of Chicago Law Schoolâ€™s AI Lab with expert-backed insight.

Disclaimer.text: This is a beta product. It uses AI and may provide incorrect information. Anything you upload may be shared with ChatGPT. Do not upload sensitive personal information. LeaseChat provides legal information, not legal advice, and does not create an attorney-client relationship. LeaseChat is not your attorney.
